name: e2e_run
description: Run E2E browser tests. Specify "all" to run every suite, "suite" for a specific suite, or "file" for a JSON file path. Returns structured results with pass/fail status, duration, and error details.

arguments.name: all
arguments.desc: Run all test suites from the tests directory

arguments.name: suite
arguments.desc: Suite name to run (e.g. "auth", "01-login"). Matches with or without numeric prefix.

arguments.name: file
arguments.desc: Absolute or relative path to a JSON test file

arguments.name: concurrency
arguments.desc: Number of parallel workers (default from config)

arguments.name: baseUrl
arguments.desc: Override the base URL for this run

arguments.name: retries
arguments.desc: Number of retries for failed tests

arguments.name: cwd
arguments.desc: Absolute path to the project root directory

name: e2e_list
description: List all available E2E test suites with their test names and counts.

arguments.name: cwd
arguments.desc: Absolute path to the project root directory

name: e2e_create_test
description: Create a new E2E test JSON file. Provide the suite name and an array of test objects, each with a name and actions array.

arguments.name: tests
arguments.desc: Array of test objects with { name, actions }

arguments.name: hooks
arguments.desc: Optional hooks: beforeAll, afterAll, beforeEach, afterEach (each an array of actions)

arguments.name: cwd
arguments.desc: Absolute path to the project root directory

name: e2e_pool_status
description: Get the status of the Chrome pool (browserless/chrome). Shows availability, running sessions, capacity, and queued requests.

arguments.name: cwd
arguments.desc: Absolute path to the project root directory

name: e2e_pool_start
description: Start the Chrome pool (browserless/chrome Docker container). Requires Docker to be running.

arguments.name: cwd
arguments.desc: Absolute path to the project root directory

name: e2e_pool_stop
description: Stop the Chrome pool Docker container.

arguments.name: cwd
arguments.desc: Absolute path to the project root directory
